Package embedding.nearestNeighbors

Class NearestNeighborDescend.WeightedIndex

java.lang.Object
embedding.nearestNeighbors.NearestNeighborDescend.WeightedIndex
Enclosing class:
NearestNeighborDescend<T>
private static class NearestNeighborDescend.WeightedIndex
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of a single element as it is needed in the NNDescend algorithm. An object is represented as its index, its weight and whether it is marked or not.
Author:
Anton Ballmaier

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int index
    index of the object as to KNearestNeighborGraph.nodes.

      public WeightedIndex​(int index, double weight, boolean marked)

      weight - the weight
      marked - whether this is marked
